body_html: Hi @inescoelho! I like the idea of browsing in the history. I would prefer to focus the UI for the majority of users, for who the current year matters only. And thus, adding the year 2016 adds a bit of noise in the UI. Maybe we can add something like a select box to filter activities by year and/or previous team names and what not?
